```{r}
cells <- integrated[[]]
cells <- subset(cells, !is.na(cloneType))
cells <- rownames(cells)
subset <- subset(integrated, cells = cells)
```

```{r}
VlnPlot(subset, features = "KLRB1", pt.size = F, assay = "RNA")
ggsave("KLRB1_exspression_clonotypesOnly.pdf", height=3, width=5)
```
